definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: conduct, bear along, esp. in procession (Aram. [[יַבֵּל]], [[אוֹבִיל]] id., yabel Pa. lead along, also Ethpa.; Aph. lead, conduct; Zinj. [[יבל]] id., DHM:Sendsch. Gloss.; As. abâlu ([[ובל]]), bring, conduct, COT:Gloss. Dl:Pr 122 ff.; Ar. wabala is run vehemently (of horse), pursue sharply, pour down rain, wablun violent rain)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יוֹבִילֵנִי]] Ps 60:11, Ps 108:11; 1 s. sf. [[אוֹבִילֵם]] Je 31:9; 3 mpl. [[יוֹבִילוּ]] Ps 68:30; [[יׁבִילוּ]] Ps 76:12 (juss.); [[יוֹבִלוּן]] Zep 3:10; sf. [[יׁבִלוּהָ]] Is 23:7; —
bear along offerings, c. acc. rei, Zep 3:10; c. [[ל]] pers. Ps 68:30, Ps 76:12.
carry away, only [[רַגְלֶיהָ מֵרָחוֹק לָגוּר]] ´[[י]] Is 23:7 her feet used to carry her far away to sojourn (of Tyre as colonizing and trading city).
lead, conduct, c. obj. as sf., of returning exiles Je 31:9; triumphant army, sq. acc. loc., Ps 60:11 = Ps 108:11.
be borne along: of things, sq. [[לְ]], a gift Is 18:7; idol Ho 10:6; oil Ho 12:2.
be borne to the grave: [[מִבֶּטֶן לַקֶּבֶר אוּבָָל]] Job 10:19; [[לִקְבָרוֹת יוּבָָל]] Job 21:32.
be led, conducted, sq. [[לְ]], Ps 45:15, Je 11:19, Is 53:7; abs. Ps 45:16; be led forth (from captivity in Babylon) Is 55:12, abs. (‖[[יחא]]); the wicked (for judgment) abs. Job 21:30.
